schemes.name: Rashtriya e-Market Services (ReMS) – Unified Market Platform
schemes.department: Department of Agricultural Marketing, Government of Karnataka
schemes.description: Provides an online trading platform with transparent price discovery and unified market access across APMC markets in Karnataka.
schemes.benefits: Transparent pricing, reduced intermediaries and wider market access for farmers.
schemes.eligibility: Registered farmers, traders, commission agents and market participants in Karnataka.
schemes.how_to_apply: Register through APMC markets or the ReMS market portal.

schemes.name: Minimum Support Price Procurement – Karnataka State Agencies
schemes.department: Food, Civil Supplies & Consumer Affairs Department, Government of Karnataka
schemes.description: Ensures procurement of notified crops at Minimum Support Price through designated procurement centers.
schemes.benefits: Price assurance, income stability and protection from market fluctuations.
schemes.eligibility: Farmers selling notified crops during the official procurement period.
schemes.how_to_apply: Sell produce at designated procurement centers or APMC yards.

schemes.name: Karnataka Agricultural Produce Marketing (Regulation) System
schemes.department: Department of Agricultural Marketing, Government of Karnataka
schemes.description: Provides regulated market access with grading, quality control and market fee regulation through APMC markets.
schemes.benefits: Fair trade practices, quality assurance and regulated pricing mechanisms.
schemes.eligibility: Licensed traders, farmers and registered market participants.
schemes.how_to_apply: Register through APMC offices or market committees.

schemes.name: National Agriculture Market (e-NAM)
schemes.department: Small Farmers Agribusiness Consortium (SFAC) / Ministry of Agriculture
schemes.description: A national online trading platform connecting APMCs across India for transparent bidding and inter-state trade.
schemes.benefits: Wider buyer access, competitive pricing and transparent auctions.
schemes.eligibility: Registered farmers, traders, FPOs and market participants.
schemes.how_to_apply: Register through the e-NAM portal or APMC facilitation centers.

schemes.name: Support for Farmer Producer Organizations (Market & Aggregation Support)
schemes.department: Department of Agriculture & Cooperation, Government of Karnataka
schemes.scope: State Supported (Linked with Central FPO Scheme)
schemes.description: Supports aggregation, warehousing, collective marketing and direct market linkage for farmer producer organizations.
schemes.benefits: Improved bargaining power, reduced transaction costs and better market realization.
schemes.eligibility: Registered FPOs, cooperatives and farmer producer companies.
schemes.how_to_apply: Apply through District Agriculture Office, NABARD or SFAC.

schemes.name: Market Infrastructure Development for Grading & Rural Markets
schemes.description: Provides financial assistance for development of rural markets, grading yards, pack houses and farmer market facilities.
schemes.benefits: Improved market infrastructure, reduced post-harvest losses and better price realization.
schemes.eligibility: State agencies, market committees, cooperatives and FPOs.
schemes.how_to_apply: Apply through State Agricultural Marketing Department.
